lines: 1. Ku Vangama Ka Yo Nyeleti, Handzula Nguvu Ya Vusiku;
Ku Kombeta Tintlharhi Tshama, La Yesu A Tswariweke.
Tintshaveni, Magoveni, Vangama Wena Nyeleti; Vonakarisa Namuntlha, Vukulu Bya Nsovo.
2. Ntiyiso Wa Rito Ra Hosi, Wu Ti Byerile To Tintlharhi, Hi Ta Nyelelti Ya Vurhonga,
3. Ya Voninga Tanihi Khale, Rivoningo Ra Le Misaven;
Hi Ta Fika Kaya Tilweni, Loko Hi Ri Sala Ndzhaku.
